intro: Chasmatophyllum nelii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its rosette of velvety, waxy leaves. Chasmatophyllum nelii is popular as a houseplant due to its compact size and ability to bloom year-round under proper care.
